timeline.message: Add more logs in deployment notification handling

timeline.bodyText:
Nice!
Since you are adding this... As a good practice for external calls, I'd suggest log before and after making any external call, with the enough identifier for debugging purpose(if not logged by SDK). Sometimes even entire request should be logged if necessary.
For example,
logger.atInfo().kv("Thing Name", thingName).log("Subscribing to job execution change events."); and logger.atInfo().kv("Thing Name", thingName).log("Subscribed to job execution change events.");
Let's add the identifier for now and we could re-visit logging later.
timeline.author: leaf94

replies.bodyText:
Yes. I can add that. I didn't add both before and after because we're not waiting for this async call. One log line seems enough here and we do log when the response comes in.
UPDATE: logging both before and after this call makes sense. I'll update.
